name: Drillbit (Cody Ward)
description:
DrillBit is a mining game similar to the classic Flash Game, Motherload.

You've lost your keys and must find them to return home. 
Dig to the bottom of the world to find your lost keys, returning to the shop for fuel, upgrades and to sell your collected ore. 

Return to the ship with your keys in the shortest time possible!

KeyControl←Move/Drill Left→Move/Drill Right↓Move/Drill Down↑Fly Up[Space]Interact1Standard Audio2No Music / Just SFX3Mute Audio4No SFX / Just Music
